mdRecord.dcterms:title: Aspects of child life and education / by G. Stanley Hall and some of his pupils; edited by Theodate L. Smith
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hall, G. Stanley (Granville Stanley), 1844-1924
Smith, Theodate Louise, 1860-1914
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "The papers which constitute this volume have all been printed in my journals, most of them in the Pedagogical seminary, but are here revised, condensed, or amplified, and provided with up-to-date bibliographies on each topic by Dr. Theodate L. Smith."--Pref., signed: G. Stanley Hall.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Child psychology
Educational psychology
